text:
Sucuri, Inc - Remote

Our company is fully remote and we have people working from all sort of places: USA, Canada, Brazil, Spain, Romania, etc.

Right now we have 3 positions open:

-Senior PHP Developer -Senior FrontEnd Developer -Product UI/UX Designer

http://sucuri.net/company/employment

If interested, you can email jobs@sucuri.net for more details.

thanks,
